task.title: Dairy-Free Vanilla Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: A recipe for making dairy-free vanilla ice cream with the ice cream machine. This recipe will make about 6 cups, or 10-12 servings.

taskbody.context: You'll need these ingredients- 4 cups unsweetened dairy-free milk (soy, hemp, almond, or rice), 2 ½ tablespoons tapioca starch, 1 cup granulated sugar, pinch kosher salt, 1 ½ teaspoons pure vanilla extract.

step.cmd: Using a hand mixer on low speed or whisk, mix together all of the ingredients in a medium-sized bowl
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight
Whisk the mixture again after refrigeration
Turn the ice cream machine on
Pour the mixture through the spout
Let it mix until thickened to a soft, creamy texture
If a firmer consistency is desired, follow step 4 from Recipe 1
